overview: You can now launch GitHub Copilot prompts directly from select pages on GitHub Docs .

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: You can now launch GitHub Copilot prompts directly from select pages on GitHub Docs .

Weâ€™ve introduced dynamic GitHub Copilot prompts, making it easy to move seamlessly from documentation to Copilot so you can get right back to your work. Instead of manually copying and pasting a prompt, you can now launch a prefilled prompt from docs in GitHub Copilot.
Dynamic Copilot prompts are available in three types:
Inline prompts : Send general questions to GitHub Copilot
Prompt blocks : Open a GitHub-related prompt in GitHub Copilot
Prompt blocks with context : Launch a prompt and a relevant code block in GitHub Copilot
To try out the new dynamic GitHub Copilot prompts, check out the tutorial on improving code readability .
